Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Hermano
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A dedicated refrigeration vehicle, the Hermano is a decent cargo transporter with a specific niche in ferrying perishable goods. Decent in long-range travel along roads, it performs terribly in off-road or winter conditions.

While there are better cargo transporters even in lower tiers, this truck can transport cargo in a frozen state, preventing spoilage. Due to the extra machinery, performance suffers and it should stay away from conflict zones.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
